SELECT sinfo.id AS id, sinfo.sale_code, DATE_FORMAT(sinfo.sale_date, '%Y-%m-%d') sale_date, case when uinfo.is_quit = 0 then concat('L', sinfo.salesman_code) else sinfo.salesman_code end salesman_code, IFNULL((SELECT SUM(srd.collected_amount) FROM tab_sale_receipts_details srd WHERE srd.sale_code = sinfo.sale_code), 0) AS collected_amount, cs.cust_code, cs.cust_name, uinfo.user_code, uinfo.real_name, uinfo.commission_rate,IFNULL(sinfo.discount_amount,0) discount_amount, sgd.goods_num, CASE WHEN sgd.real_sell_price >= 0 THEN sgd.real_sell_price ELSE sgd.unit_price END unitPrice, snp.standard_buy_price, sgd.stock_code, sgd.stock_name FROM tab_sale_info sinfo LEFT JOIN tab_customer_supplier cs ON sinfo.cust_code = cs.cust_code AND cs.cust_type IN (1, 3) LEFT JOIN tab_user_info uinfo ON sinfo.user_code = uinfo.user_code LEFT JOIN tab_sale_goods_detail sgd ON sinfo.sale_code = sgd.sale_code /* LEFT JOIN tab_sale_receipts_details srd ON sinfo.sale_code = srd.sale_code*/ INNER JOIN tab_stock_num_price snp ON sgd.stock_code = snp.stock_code WHERE 1 = 1
AND sinfo.sale_date >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
AND sinfo.sale_date <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59')
AND uinfo.user_code IN
#{item}
AND uinfo.user_code is not null

SELECT si.id AS id, case when ui.is_quit = 0 then concat('L', IFNULL(si.salesman_code, '')) else IFNULL(si.salesman_code, '') end salesmanCode, IFNULL(ui.real_name, '') AS realName, SUM(IFNULL(sg.goods_num,0)) AS sumGoodsNum, /*数量*/ SUM(IFNULL(IFNULL(sg.goods_num,0) * IFNULL(sg.real_sell_price,0) ,0)) AS sumSaleVolume, /*销售额, 总金额*/ SUM(IFNULL(sg.goods_num,0) * IFNULL(sprice.standard_buy_price,0)) AS sumSaleCost, /*成本*/ SUM(IFNULL(IFNULL(sg.goods_num,0) * IFNULL(sg.real_sell_price,0) ,0)) - SUM(IFNULL(sg.goods_num,0) * IFNULL(sprice.standard_buy_price,0)) AS sumGrossMargin, /*毛利*/ IFNULL(CONVERT( SUM(IFNULL(sg.goods_num,0) * IFNULL(sg.real_sell_price,0) - IFNULL(sg.goods_num,0) * IFNULL(sprice.standard_buy_price,0)) / SUM(IFNULL(sg.goods_num,0) * IFNULL(sg.real_sell_price,0)),DECIMAL(10, 4)) * 100, 0) AS grossRate,/*毛利率*/ (SELECT SUM(IFNULL(sii.discount_amount,0)) FROM tab_sale_info sii WHERE 1=1
AND sii.sale_date >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
AND sii.sale_date <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59')
AND sii.user_code = si.user_code ) sumCost, /*费用也就是优惠金额*/ IFNULL(ui.commission_rate, 0) AS commissionRate, IFNULL(ui.user_code, '') AS userCode FROM tab_sale_info si LEFT JOIN tab_user_info ui ON ui.user_code = si.user_code LEFT JOIN tab_sale_goods_detail sg ON si.sale_code = sg.sale_code LEFT JOIN tab_stock_num_price sprice ON sprice.stock_code = sg.stock_code WHERE 1 =1
AND si.user_code IN
#{item}
AND si.sale_date >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
AND si.sale_date <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59')
AND si.sale_ticket_type IN
#{item}
GROUP BY si.user_code ORDER BY si.salesman_code

SELECT SUM(IFNULL(rd.collected_amount,0)) AS sumSaleVolume, /*销售额, 总金额*/ (SELECT SUM(IFNULL(sii.discount_amount,0)) FROM tab_sale_info sii WHERE 1=1
AND sii.sale_date >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
AND sii.sale_date <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59')
AND sii.user_code = si.user_code ) sumCost, /*费用也就是优惠金额*/ IFNULL(ui.commission_rate, 0) AS commissionRate, /* 佣金率 */ IFNULL(ui.user_code, '') AS userCode FROM tab_sale_info si LEFT JOIN tab_user_info ui ON ui.user_code = si.user_code LEFT JOIN tab_sale_receipts_details rd ON si.sale_code = rd.sale_code WHERE 1 =1
AND si.user_code IN
#{item}
AND si.sale_date >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
AND si.sale_date <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59')
AND si.payment_status IN ('cs03', 'cs02')
AND si.sale_ticket_type IN
#{item}
GROUP BY si.user_code ORDER BY si.salesman_code
SELECT id, dept_code, dept_name, parent_code FROM tab_dept_info WHERE 1=1 AND parent_code = #{parentCode} AND is_enable = 1
SELECT id, dept_code, dept_name, parent_code FROM tab_dept_info WHERE 1=1 AND parent_code = #{deptCode} AND is_enable = 1

SELECT dept.id, dept.dept_code, dept.dept_name,dept.parent_code, IFNULL(sum(ss.sumSaleVolume), 0) AS sumSaleVolume,/*销售额, 总金额-优惠金额*/ IFNULL(sum(ss.sumSaleCost), 0) AS sumSaleCost,/*成本*/ IFNULL(sum(ss.sumGrossMargin), 0) AS sumGrossMargin,/*毛利*/ IFNULL(sum(ss.sumCost), 0) AS sumCost, /*额外支出费用*/ IFNULL(sum(ss.pureProfit), 0) AS pureProfit,/*纯利润*/ IFNULL(sum(ss.commission), 0) AS commission/*佣金*/ FROM tab_dept_info dept LEFT JOIN (SELECT ui.user_code AS userCode, ui.dept_code AS deptCode, SUM(si.receivable_accoun) AS sumSaleVolume, /*销售额, 总金额-优惠金额*/ SUM(sg.goods_num * sg.unit_price) AS sumSaleCost, /*成本*/ SUM(si.receivable_accoun - sg.goods_num * sg.unit_price) AS sumGrossMargin, /*毛利*/ SUM(sg1.goods_num) AS sumCost, /*额外支出费用*/ SUM(si.receivable_accoun) - SUM(sg1.goods_num) AS pureProfit,/*纯利润*/ IFNULL(ui.commission_rate * SUM(si.receivable_accoun), 0) / 100 AS commission, /*佣金*/ ui.real_name AS realName FROM tab_sale_info si LEFT JOIN tab_user_info ui ON ui.user_code = si.user_code INNER JOIN tab_sale_goods_detail sg ON si.sale_code = sg.sale_code INNER JOIN tab_sale_goods_detail sg1 ON si.sale_code = sg1.sale_code AND sg1.stock_code REGEXP '^cb' LEFT JOIN tab_sale_receipts_details sr ON si.sale_code = sr.sale_code WHERE 1 =1 GROUP BY si.user_code) ss ON dept.dept_code = ss.deptCode WHERE dept.is_enable = 1
AND dept.dept_code IN
#{item}
GROUP BY dept.dept_code

SELECT YEAR(sale_date) AS `year`,MONTH(sale_date) AS `month`, SUM(goods.goods_num * goods.real_sell_price) AS sum_receivable_accoun FROM tab_sale_info sinfo INNER JOIN tab_sale_goods_detail goods ON sinfo.sale_code = goods.sale_code GROUP BY YEAR (sale_date), MONTH (sale_date) ORDER BY YEAR(sale_date);

/*SELECT DAY(sale_date) AS `day`, SUM(receivable_accoun) AS sum_receivable_accoun FROM tab_sale_info WHERE MONTH(sale_date) = MONTH(sysdate()) AND YEAR(sale_date) = YEAR(sysdate()) GROUP BY DAY(sale_date)*/
SELECT DAY(t.sale_date) AS `day`,sum(td.goods_num * td.real_sell_price) AS sum_receivable_accoun from tab_sale_info t,tab_sale_goods_detail td WHERE MONTH(t.sale_date) = MONTH(sysdate()) AND YEAR(t.sale_date) = YEAR(sysdate()) AND t.sale_code = td.sale_code GROUP BY DAY(t.sale_date)

SELECT cs.cust_code AS custCode, cs.cust_name AS custName, uinfo.real_name AS realName, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tab_sale_info s WHERE s.cust_code = cs.cust_code) AS buyCount,/*购买次数*/ SUM(IFNULL(goods.goods_num, 0) * IFNULL(goods.real_sell_price, 0)) AS saleVolume,/*销售额*/ SUM(IFNULL(goods.goods_num,0)) AS goodsNum, /*数量*/ SUM(IFNULL(goods.goods_num, 0) * IFNULL(price.standard_buy_price, 0)) AS cost,/*成本*/ (SELECT sum(ss.discount_amount) FROM tab_sale_info ss WHERE ss.cust_code = cs.cust_code) AS discountAmount /*优惠金额*/ FROM tab_customer_supplier cs LEFT JOIN tab_sale_info sinfo ON cs.cust_code = sinfo.cust_code LEFT JOIN tab_user_info uinfo ON sinfo.user_code = uinfo.user_code LEFT JOIN tab_sale_goods_detail goods ON sinfo.sale_code = goods.sale_code LEFT JOIN tab_stock_num_price price ON goods.stock_code = price.stock_code WHERE cs.cust_type IN (1, 3) AND (cs.totalVolume >= 12000 OR cs.buyCount >= 5) GROUP BY cs.cust_code ORDER BY saleVolume DESC,buyCount DESC

SELECT IFNULL(cs.grade_code,'') AS gradeCode, cs.cust_grade AS custGrade, COUNT(cs.grade_code) AS `count` FROM tab_customer_supplier cs WHERE cs.cust_type IN (1, 3) AND cs.grade_code IS NOT NULL AND (cs.totalVolume >= 12000 OR cs.buyCount >= 5) AND cs.cust_code NOT REGEXP '^CB' GROUP BY cs.grade_code

select cs.user_code AS userCode,IFNULL(uinfo.real_name,'') AS realName from tab_customer_supplier cs LEFT JOIN tab_user_info uinfo ON uinfo.user_code = cs.user_code where cs.cust_type IN (1, 3) and cs.user_code is not null GROUP BY cs.user_code

select cs.cust_name AS custName, cs.cust_grade AS custGrade, cs.totalVolume AS saleVolume, cs.buyCount AS buyCount from tab_customer_supplier cs LEFT JOIN tab_user_info uinfo ON uinfo.user_code = cs.user_code where cs.user_code = #{userCode} and cs.cust_type IN (1, 3) AND (cs.totalVolume >= 12000 OR cs.buyCount >= 5)
